00064 class  XSWildcard : public XSObject
00065 {

00073         NSCONSTRAINT_ANY          = 1,

00081         NSCONSTRAINT_DERIVATION_LIST         = 3
00082     };

00094         PC_SKIP                   = 2,
00101         PC_LAX                    = 3
00102     };
